name: Endless Dungeon (itch) (NBHGame)
description:
Collect and deposit as much treasure back to the start while collecting gold along the way while defeating the guardians of the dungeon with your trusty gun! Beware that this is no ordinary dungeon as it shifts and change each time you reach one side so go on in if you dare!
